{"website_url": "https://www.espncricinfo.com/player/dilhara-fernando-48835", "full_name_en": "Congenige Randhi Dilhara Fernando", "birthday": "July 19, 1979, Colombo", "batting_style_en": "Right hand bat", "bowling_style_en": "Right arm fast medium", "role_en": "Bowler", "biography_en": "When Fernando burst onto the international scene, young and raw, he soon inspired hope that he would be the long-term replacement for Chaminda Vaas as the cutting edge of the pace attack. He has natural pace - six months after his debut he was timed at 91.9 mph in Durban - hits the pitch hard and moves the ball off the seam.
